insert: insert into posted (name,posttime,hash) select ?,strftime('%Y%m%d%H%M%S'),hash from user where name = ?;
geticon: select name as icon,posttime as code from posted where posttime =(select min(posttime) from posted where posttime > ? and hash =?);
delete: delete from posted where posttime < strftime('%Y%m%d%H%M%S')-180
userinfo: select name,hash as url from user where inform='0' and name = ?
userupd: update user set inform = '1' where name = ?
